sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Four directors are nominated for election to a class that will serve until the 2020 annual meeting of shareholders and until their successors have been duly elected and qualified, or their earlier retirement or resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is intended that the shares represented by each proxy will be voted, in the discretion of the proxies, FOR the nominees for directors set forth below, each of whom is an incumbent, or for any substitute nominee or nominees designated by our Board of Directors in the event any nominee or nominees become unavailable for election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that an incumbent director receives a greater number of votes against his or her election than votes for such election, he or she is required to tender his or her resignation for consideration by the Nominating and Governance Committee of the Board of Directors in accordance with our Bylaws, as described on page 20 under "Director Resignation Policy."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The principal occupations of, and certain other information regarding, the nominees and our continuing directors are set forth below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, information about each director's specific experience, attributes and skills that led the Board to the conclusion that each of the directors is highly qualified to serve as a member of the Board is set forth below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Bunch retired as PPG's Executive Chairman of the Board and as a director on September 1, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company thanks Mr. Bunch for his over 30 years of dedicated service to PPG, including serving as a director since 2002 and as Chairman of the Board since 2005.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Bunch's extraordinary leadership significantly strengthened the financial performance of the Company, creating one of the greatest growth periods in its history and transforming it into one of the leading coatings companies in the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Usher resigned from our Board of Directors effective at the 2016 annual meeting of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company thanks Mr. Usher for his many year of dedicated service to PPG.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that each of the Company's directors is highly qualified to serve as a member of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the directors has contributed to he mix of skills, core competencies and qualifications of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors are highly educated and have diverse backgrounds and talents and extensive track records of success in what we believe are highly relevant positions with some of the most admired organizations in the world.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many of our directors also benefit from an intimate knowledge of our operations and corporate philosophy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that each director's service as the chairman, chief executive officer, chief operating officer, president or group president of a well-respected company has provided the directors with skills hat are important to serving on our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has also considered the fact that all of our directors have worked for, or served on the boards of directors of, a variety of companies in a wide range of industries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, the Board has noted that our directors have skills that, among others, have made them particularly suited to serve as a director of PPG, a global manufacturer of high technology paints, coatings, specialty materials and fiber glass for industrial and consumer markets, with operations in more than 70 countries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that through their varying backgrounds, our directors bring a wealth of experiences, new ideas and solutions to our Board.

sentences.text: Securities Trading Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PPG officers and directors may not engage in any transaction in which they may profit from short-term speculative swings in the value of PPG's securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This prohibition includes "short sales" (selling borrowed securities that the seller hopes can be purchased at a lower price in the future) or "short sales against the box" (selling owned, but not delivered securities), "put" and "call" options (publicly available rights to sell or buy securities within a certain period of time at a specified price) and other hedging transactions designed to minimize an executive's risk inherent in owning PPG stock, such as zero-cost collars and forward sale contracts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, officers may not hold PPG stock in a margin account and may not pledge PPG stock as collateral for a loan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy is designed to ensure compliance with all insider trading rules.
